offer_settings.coupon_offer: Receive a 10% discount on all purchases.

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms:
<p>The cozy atmosphere of the restaurant, where every guest can feel good to homely. Style designed gastronomy is based on the foundations of Czech cuisine, and dishes are served smaller meals suitable for beer, traditional meals, as well as vegetarian meals and dishes based on the foundations of rational diet. Part of the menu are also cheeses, desserts, pastries, fruit and ice cream. Food production is based on the majority of domestic production of meat, spice mixes and complete meals.</p>
<p>Lesser talks catering facilities are equipped with a special device, called a tank, ie., The beer is brewed, not the classic barrels (kegs), but from large tanks. It is a modern system of stainless steel tanks of 10 hl hl and 5, in which the beer is stored in sealed polypropylene bag &#8211; the bag-in-box. When using this system comes when pouring beer at all in contact with air, which has a positive impact on the quality and durability of unpasteurized beer.Offer valid only when paying by Diners Club card and the discount cannot be combined with any other offers. Discounts cannot be applied to the daily menu. Hours: Monday through Sunday 11:00am &#8211; 11:00pm.</p>
